verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> you in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>; the name <S%H8034><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> defend you <S%H7682><s%>;
Send <S%H7971><s%> you help <S%H5828><s%> from the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and strengthen <S%H5582><s%> you out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>;
Remember <S%H2142><s%> all your offerings <S%H4503><s%>, and accept <S%H1878><s%> your burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>; Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Grant <S%H5414><s%> you according to your own heart <S%H3824><s%>, and fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all your counsel <S%H6098><s%>.

We will rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in your salvation <S%H3444><s%>, and in the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> we will set up our banners <S%H1713><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all your petitions <S%H4862><s%>.

Now know <S%H3045><s%> I that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saves <S%H3467><s%> his anointed <S%H4899><s%>; he will hear <S%H6030><s%> him from his holy <S%H6944><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> with the saving <S%H3468><s%> strength <S%H1369><s%> of his right hand <S%H3225><s%>.
Some trust in chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and some in horses <S%H5483><s%>: but we will remember <S%H2142><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
They are brought down <S%H3766><s%> and fallen <S%H5307><s%>: but we are risen <S%H6965><s%>, and stand upright <S%H5749><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%>: let the king <S%H4428><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> us when <S%H3117><s%> we call <S%H7121><s%>.
